page.title: 20WESTBURY C.E.JUN.SCHOOL
page.content: The school which provided the information for this project was moved to its present site in 1959 replacing various old buildings in the centre of the town. In July 1985 there were 281(433 in 1977)children on roll in 9 classrooms three of them being temporary buildings.Recently(in1984)a special unit was opened for children with moderate learning difficulties and the staff was increased to 11 full time teachers,one part-time teacher,1 secretary,4 mid-day supervisors,2 welfare assistants,3 cooks a caretaker and 2 cleaners A broad curriculum is offered-maths, language skills,environmental studies, music and physical education.Radio, T.V.,video,tape recordings, visits and computers are all used to stimulate and extend learning experiences.
